Articles.Content:
I didnt even drop anything. I, I... Build this thing on my first try, I didnt even want to have an SSTO, Just a heavy lifter. This could potentionally lift more if it had dropped the third stage (or first?). But it would not be an SSTO that way.

PS: If anybody wants the .craft file say in replies.

<iframe class="imgur-album" src="http://imgur.com/a/gTXC6/embed" frameborder="0" height="550" width="100%"></iframe>

Edited April 3, 2014 by EvilotionCR2
Corrections

I didnt even drop anything. I, I... Build this thing on my first try, I didnt even want to have an SSTO, Just a heavy lifter. This could potentionally lift more if it had dropped the third stage (or first?).

PS: If anybody wants the .craft file say in replies.

<iframe class="imgur-album" src="http://imgur.com/a/gTXC6/embed" frameborder="0" height="550" width="100%"></iframe>

They say the new SLS is overpowered.

I say "I don't care, docking always annoyed me anyway".

Cargo is 1.5 orange tanks, an large RSC tank and a lab? close to 60 ton.

Still impressive, I put 200 ton cargo up with six 3.75 meter boosters in aspargus.

[deleted]

Edited January 14 by PetahSchwetah

I was expecting a 350 Tonne Payload, I end up with something tiny and small.

You overkilled that launch vehicle...

I was expecting a 350 Tonne Payload, I end up with something tiny and small.

You overkilled that launch vehicle...

Yeah I love overkilling and I just realized that its not a 350 tons to orbit, its just 60 tons to orbit

EDIT: hold on, I lifted the whole second stage too. Which means its around 120 tons to LKO SSTO. BRB gotta check that.

Edited April 3, 2014 by EvilotionCR2
With a launcher that big, 120+ tons is not a big deal.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Not sure couldnt see the picture, fixed it in my post.

Looks good though, not what I was expecting. Rare I see a rocket style SSTO anymore.
